description: This file defines a C++ interface 'IOttPermissions' within the WPEFramework::Exchange namespace. It declares several pure virtual methods for permissions management and token retrieval related to an OTT service.

classes.name: IOttPermissions
classes.description: Interface for OTT permissions management, including methods for pinging, retrieving, invalidating, and updating permissions, as well as obtaining distributor and auth tokens.

methods.name: Ping
methods.description: Sends a message to check service responsiveness and receives a reply.

methods.name: GetPermissions
methods.description: Retrieves permissions for a specific application ID as a JSON array string.

methods.name: InvalidatePermissions
methods.description: Invalidates cached permissions for a specified application ID.

methods.name: UpdatePermissionsCache
methods.description: Updates the permission cache by fetching permissions from a remote service for a specific app.

methods.name: GetDistributorToken
methods.description: Retrieves a distributor/platform token for an application.

methods.name: GetAuthToken
methods.description: Retrieves an authentication token for an application.

ctags.name: IOttPermissions
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IOttPermissions : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
